title: Advanced R (2ed): field manual
text:
Another version?
This is yet another version of the solutions to Advanced R, 2nd edition (advR2). Iâ€™ve returned to advR2 more than any other for my day-to-day activities as an R developer, and after working through each of the exercises, then reading how others had solved them, I decided some of my solutions differed enough to warrant putting them into a book.
I highly recommend the Advanced R Solutions by Malte Grosser, Henning Bumann, and Hadley Wickham. Indrajeet Patil also has a solutions manual worth reading for alternative approaches.
